# Type Providers Docs

## Type providers

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/tutorials/type-providers/index.md): Learn how an F# type provider is a component that provides types, properties, and methods for use in your programs.
- [Create a Type Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/tutorials/type-providers/creating-a-type-provider.md): Learn how to create your own F# type providers by examining several simple type providers to illustrate the basic concepts.
- [Type provider Security](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/tutorials/type-providers/type-provider-security.md): Learn about type provider security in F#, including how to change the trust settings for a type provider.
- [Troubleshooting Type Providers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/tutorials/type-providers/troubleshooting-type-providers.md): Discover potential solutions for the problems that you are most likely to encounter when you use type providers in F#.
